value.title: Create reports with Power BI and Dataverse for Teams
value.excerpt: Learn how to build your first report with Microsoft Power BI and Dataverse for Teams.

value.title: Perform analytics in Power BI¬†
value.excerpt: You will learn how to use Power BI to perform data analytical functions, how to identify outliers in your data, how to group data together, and how to bin data for analysis. You will also learn how to perform time series analysis. Finally, you will work with advanced analytic features of Power BI, such as Quick Insights, AI Insights, and the Analyze feature.

value.title: #1 DAX Fridays! 101: The basics of the DAX Language
value.excerpt: In today's video I want to go through the basics of DAX and explain basic pitfalls that you will fall into if you come from excel or are a business user. #daxfridays #dax #curbal   Have a great Friday! value.title: DAX Fridays! #78: When should I use FILTER() with CALCULATE?
value.excerpt: When should you use the filter function with CALCULATE?  As you probably have noticed, sometimes people use a column in the filter part of CALCULATE and sometimes they use the FILTER function.  The question is, when should you use what?  In this video I will try to clarify that question.  Dont miss part

value.title: DAX! Uggg - Where do you start? | Power BI
value.excerpt: Not a coder? Don't understand DAX syntax? DAX can be intimidating and difficult to learn. Frustrating even! Learning DAX can make Power BI very rewarding. Adam has some resources to get you started in your journey.  Beginning the journey:  MS Learn: User DAX in Power BI Desktop (Free) https://docs.microsoft.com/learn/paths/dax-power-bi/

value.title: Embed a dashboard from Power BI into your application

This uses a combination of the Power BI REST APIs and the JavaScript API.
